attributes.action: give equal rights to the people of England for Free NHS prescription privileges..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As England is supposed to be part of a United Kingdom then surely it is only fair that as the people of Wales enjoy the benefits of Free NHS prescriptions then surely so should the people of England be entitled to the same privileges..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
